data.name: DeleteMessage
data.value: Delete the selected notification?

data.name: HelpText
data.value:
This app provides the ability to be notified when the status of user-specified websites changes. In other words, about their updates, which will be presented in the form of a text log. Only what the user has specified is loaded – all other objects (including ads) are ignored.
• The settings section allows you to manage and design notifications. • The main log provides a view of changes, access to source webpages from which they were received, and the ability to share them. • A static service notification will inform you about the presence of new changes received in the background

data.name: Tip_00
data.value:
Welcome touNot, the web resources supervisor service! Here you can configure the service and notifications. Some buttons and fields contain useful tips that will be shown once.
Detailed instructions for setting up the service are available on YouTube (“User manual” button in the app info window)

data.name: Tip_01
data.value: This button allows you to apply changes performed on the right side of window to the currently selected notification

data.name: Tip_02
data.value: This button allows you to add new notification with settings presented on the right side of window

data.name: Tip_03
data.value: This button allows you to remove selected notification

data.name: Tip_04
data.value: This button allows you to load settings from notification template

data.name: Tip_05
data.value: This button allows you to automatically find delimiters for the new notification (see user manual for details)

data.name: Tip_06
data.value: This section allows you to select the notification, the source of which will be opened in browser

data.name: Tip_07
data.value: This field allows you to select notification for configuring

data.name: Tip_08
data.value: When you'll close this window, the background service will start and begin monitoring. When you call settings interface again, the service will be paused for its correct configuration

data.name: Tip_09
data.value: In some cases, the needed part of web page is not the first on it, which is limited by the specified markers. This field allows you to specify which occurrence of the target area (from the top of page) should be displayed

data.name: NoTemplateInClipboard
data.value: No compatible notification templates found in the clipboard. Copy template string to clipboard and try again

data.name: Tip_10
data.value: This button allows you to share settings of configured notifications

data.name: Tip_11
data.value: This button allows you to load shared or saved settings

data.name: SettingsForm_NotWizard
data.value: Notifications wizard

data.name: WizardFailure
data.value: It looks like this site is not supported. Try using a different keyword

data.name: WizardSearch1
data.value: Detecting markers...

data.name: WizardSearch2
data.value: Requesting text...

data.name: WizardStep1
data.value:
Welcome to the notifications wizard!
This function will help you to create a notification (“watchdog”) for web resource.
First, enter the link (URL) of the website you want to watch

data.name: WizardStep2
data.value:
Now enter a keyword.
This word (or phrase) should be present right now in a part of the website you want to watch, and you expect it to change over time. The ideal would be a phrase that is present now only in this area or is first encountered on the website in it. The case of letters doesn’t matter

data.name: WizardStep3
data.value: For the specified settings, the text below is received. If it meets your expectations, click OK to add the notification. Otherwise, click Retry and we’ll try again

data.name: WizardStep4
data.value: For the specified settings, the text below is received. If it meets your expectations, click OK to add the notification. Otherwise, retry the action and try a different keyword

data.name: WizardStep5
data.value: It’s ready! Now specify the name of notification to be displayed in the main log

data.name: SettingsForm_WindowCallFlag

data.name: Tip_12
data.value:
This function allows you to set a numerical threshold. It will be compared with the first number in every obtained text using the specified comparison method. If the new text matches the condition, app will display a special warning.
It is also possible to display a notification only if this condition is met
